english.segment1: stuck inside all this time you know. we're going down without a fight. it's 2 am and i'm all washed up. and i told the boys i had enough
english.segment2: ain't no use in talking sense into me. i'm giving up i think you know what i mean. all i really wanna do is go to OC. soon that's where i'm gonna be
english.segment3: here we go coming back around again. just let 'em know we're coming back around again. here we go coming back around again. just let 'em know we're coming back around again
english.segment4: past the point of no return. i've done my time crossed the line now i live and i learn. i don't remember what daddy said. all i know is that i'm better off dead
english.segment5: ain't no use in talking sense into me. i'm giving up i think you know what i mean. all i really wanna do is go to OC. soon that's where i'm gonna be
english.segment6: here we go coming back around again. just let 'em know we're coming back around again. here we go coming back around again. just let 'em know we're coming back around again
english.segment7: oh yah to the end of the road we'll go. the road that takes us home. down the 55 we'll roam. out of the great unknown
